C

CHAT - entity.Expansion
The chat extension allows client to communicate both during and outside games via text messages.
client - package client
 
ClientApplication - Class in client
Class that starts and connects the client to the pentago server by the provided host address and the port.
ClientApplication() - Constructor for class client.ClientApplication
 
ClientBoardObserver - Class in entity.board.observer
Class that represents a board observer, which handles board updates on the client side.
ClientBoardObserver() - Constructor for class entity.board.observer.ClientBoardObserver
 
ClientHandler - Interface in client
Client handler communicates with a client connected to the server.
ClientState - Enum in entity
Class that contains different states of the client.
close() - Method in interface client.ClientHandler
Disconnect the client from the server.
close() - Method in interface client.GameClient
Close the connection with the server.
close() - Method in class client.PentagoClient
Close the connection with the server.
close() - Method in class client.PentagoClientHandler
Disconnect the client from the server.
close() - Method in interface entity.session.GameSession
Close a currently running session.
close() - Method in class entity.session.PentagoSession
Close a currently running session.
connect(InetAddress, int) - Method in interface client.GameClient
Connect to a network server by its host address and the port.
connect(InetAddress, int) - Method in class client.PentagoClient
Connect to a network server by its host address and the port.
ConnectClientTest - Class in <Unnamed>
Class that tests clients connecting and logging to the server.
ConnectClientTest() - Constructor for class ConnectClientTest
 
CONNECTING - entity.ClientState
During this state, the client and the server are handshaking their supported extensions and descriptions (almost seamlessly for both sides).
convert(MessageType, String...) - Method in class server.PentagoProtocol
Get a message by its type and args according to the protocol.
convert(MessageType, String...) - Method in interface server.ServerProtocol
Get a message by its type and args according to the protocol.
CRYPT - entity.Expansion
The CRYPT extension ensures confidentiality of messages exchanged between client and server.
